plot: A teacher stops a spree killing and must drive the getaway car for the student killer. With the police closing in on them, the teacher faces a psychological duel with the teenage psychopath, that drives him to his abyss of despair.
title: Der Ausflug
plot_es: A teacher stops a spree killing and must drive the getaway car for the student killer. With the police closing in on them, the teacher faces a psychological duel with the teenage psychopath, that drives him to his abyss of despair.
plot_en: A teacher stops a spree killing and must drive the getaway car for the student killer. With the police closing in on them, the teacher faces a psychological duel with the teenage psychopath, that drives him to his abyss of despair.
